title: Treat Heat Cramps
brief: Recognize and treat heat cramps caused by salt loss from excessive sweating.
steps: Step 1: Recognize symptoms - moderate to severe muscle cramps in legs, arms, or abdomen starting as mild discomfort.
Step 2: Immediately stop all physical activity.
Step 3: Move to shade or cooler area.
Step 4: Drink water in small amounts.
Step 5: Rest until cramps subside completely.
warnings: If you ignore early symptoms and continue activity, cramps will become severe.
Severe heat cramps require treatment as heat exhaustion.
